explorer.fileNesting.patterns.webpack.config.*: *.env, .env.*, .envrc, eslint.*, env.d.ts, postcss.config.*, prettier.*, svgo.config.*, stylelint.config.*, tailwind.config.*
explorer.fileNesting.patterns.README*: AUTHORS, BACKERS*, CHANGELOG*, CITATION*, CODE_OF_CONDUCT*, CODEOWNERS, CONTRIBUTING*, CONTRIBUTORS, COPYING, CREDITS, GOVERNANCE.MD, HISTORY.MD, LICENSE*, MAINTAINERS, SECURITY.MD, SPONSORS*
